Name: London Cocktail
Ingredients: 2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Chilled, diluted and very subtly sweetened gin invigorated by a hint of absinthe and zesty orange.
History: Adapted from a recipe in the 1922 book Cocktails: How to Mix Them by Robert Vermeire who worked at London's Embassy Club. The title page confirms this, saying "By Robert of the Embassy Club" and the book was published in London by Hebert Jenkins Limited.
Nutrition: One serving of London Cocktail contains 145 calories
